sentence: The Downballot FollowShare 0:0042:30 15301x image/svg+xml Powered by Libsyn Powered by Libsyn Leading Off GA-Sen: Former football star Herschel Walker has been the undisputed frontrunner for the Republican nomination to take on Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock from the moment he entered the race in August, but now his intra-party critics are preparing to wage an expensive ad campaign to weaken him ahead of the May 24 primarydespite Donald Trump's full-throated support for the one-time University of Georgia running back.
title: Morning Digest: Georgia Republicans try to take down Herschel Walker, despite Trump's backing

sentence: A bunch of Republicans in Georgia trying to defeat Herschel Walker because hes kind of a damaged candidate.
